text: Lomont-sur-Crête (, literally Lomont on Ridge) is a commune in the Doubs department in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in eastern France. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Lomont-sur-Crète on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Lomont-sur-Crête
